name: @mariozechner/pi-coding-agent
description: Coding agent CLI with read, bash, edit, write tools and session management

scripts.build: tsgo -p tsconfig.build.json && chmod +x dist/cli.js && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build:binary: command -v bun >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo 'Error: Bun is required for building the binary. Install it from https://bun.sh'; exit 1; } && npm run build && bun build --compile ./dist/cli.js --outfile dist/pi && npm run copy-binary-assets
scripts.copy-binary-assets: cp package.json dist/ && cp README.md dist/ && cp CHANGELOG.md dist/
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build

author: Mario Zechner
